articles.title: BMW R nineT, R nineT Scrambler Launched In India; Prices Begin At Rs. 16.75 Lakh - carandbike
articles.description: Both the R nineT and RnineT Scrambler are available as completely built-up units (CBU), and can be booked at BMW Motorrad dealerships.
articles.content: BMW Motorrad India has launched the new BMW R nineT and BMW R nineT Scrambler in India. The R nineT Scrambler is priced at ₹ 16.75 lakh (Ex-showroom), while the R nineT is priced at ₹ 18.50 lakh (Ex-… [+2578 chars]

articles.author: ET Telecom
articles.title: 2G mukt India? Jio launches new JioPhone offers to attract feature phone users - ETTelecom.com
articles.description: Reliance Jio on Friday unveiled two brand new aggressive bundled offers on its 4G feature phone - JioPhone - in a clear bid to to target the country’s remaining 300 million feature phone users and reverse the recent slowdown in its 4G customer additions.
